definitions: used to express that something is very unlikely to happen, though it would be desirable
a sarcastic way of saying that an opportunity is improbable
examples: "Are you going on vacation this year?" "Chance would be a fine thing!"
I'd love to retire early, but chance would be a fine thing.
lemma: chance would be a fine thing
synonyms: not a snowball's chance in hell
source: chance would be a fine thing
